positive.review: really solid game. only complain is trophies achievements don`t pop they are bugged.
game is good with interesting concept of abilities and shooting i would it to be more smoother in the future as it is a bit laggy , and can't wait for new characters
its alright but fix the bot problems, way too annooying to play with a bunch of bots who bottle my 7 lead. in rest everything is alright.
concept is so cool. js hoped tht there r more players cuz lowk filled w bots

Game has an interesting concept taking inspiration from Val and other shooters with a shop function and abilities, however instead of weapons to buy, you buy upgrades like giving all your abilities an extra use, or more ammo for your pistol. Basic stuff that makes you more efficient at fighting while playing one of the 4 current modes out rn (TDM, Get em all, Deathmatch, and 1v1s). Get em all is like Plunder in CoD Warzone, get money around the map, don't get hacked. Deathmatch (Kill em All) is one life TDM 3v3s. All modes have different maps to play on (4 TDM, 3 GEA, 3 KEM, 3 1v1). There are currently 16 heroes to play categorized by their skillsets (6 Slingers, 4 Stikers, 4 Disruptors, 2 Infiltrators).
Do I like it? There's some jank in the gameplay, but I like what it has going for it. It is free to play, while playing you earn diamonds which you buy envelops to roll for skins. Dupes net silver and gold coins to spend in the shop for items you want. There are some skins like the Frontier skins that I wish they would add into the shop, but they did add the previous rotation of skins to the shop to buy with gold coins, but not the Frontier skins before that, so idk what they plan to do for that. I'd recommend giving this game a try.
fun free to play pistol shooter pvp game. i like it

more people need to know about this, it's amazing
really solid game. only complain is trophies achievements don`t pop they are bugged.
interesting game but pistol only gets boring . timing is everything with the abilitys

BLACK STIGMA is a mature-action game set in a violent underworld of rival syndicates. Players engage in intense battles where strategy and tactics determine victory—whether through long-range gunfights, close-quarters brawls, stealth ambushes, or chaotic all-out fights. Customization is key: tune your weapons to suit your playstyle and stand out on the battlefield. Choose a master and define your role in combat, adapting to diverse game modes. Maps are designed like cinematic sets—from abandoned subways to luxury rooftops—immersing players in a gritty cityscape of betrayal and crime.
game is good with interesting concept of abilities and shooting i would it to be more smoother in the future as it is a bit laggy , and can't wait for new characters
its alright but fix the bot problems, way too annooying to play with a bunch of bots who bottle my 7 lead. in rest everything is alright.
Very cool game i enjoyed it! There are some cool characters, interesting skills and weapons. Just keep going guys ;)
This is the kind of game I have been waiting, 11/10, beautiful & unique

All modes have different maps to play on (4 TDM, 3 GEA, 3 KEM, 3 1v1). There are currently 16 heroes to play categorized by their skillsets (6 Slingers, 4 Stikers, 4 Disruptors, 2 Infiltrators).
Do I like it? There's some jank in the gameplay, but I like what it has going for it. It is free to play, while playing you earn diamonds which you buy envelops to roll for skins. Dupes net silver and gold coins to spend in the shop for items you want. There are some skins like the Frontier skins that I wish they would add into the shop, but they did add the previous rotation of skins to the shop to buy with gold coins, but not the Frontier skins before that, so idk what they plan to do for that. I'd recommend giving this game a try.

negative.review: I enjoy the gameplay and unique art style but i cannot recommend this game. After nearly 6 hours of gameplay, I have not matched with one single human. Every game mode is filled with bots. I was told once I move up in tiers there would be more player filled lobbies. I reached Lvl 14 and somehow still in Iron V. I am confused on how to move up in Tiers after winning every game (due to there only being bots). The customization is nice and I do not feel like I have to buy anything to enjoy the game. Some character melee animations are very janky, leaving you wondering if you are even attacking. I also like that the gameplay does not feel like it is strictly developed around abilities. Everyone feels useful. I have more pros than cons but the cons are too crucial to play. Overall it feels like a FPS aim training game due to never connecting with other players.
It feels like a typical korean cashgrab. There's basically no gameplay, everything is for sell and the game is basically just bots.

Probably the worst shooter i have ever played. Crashed my pc within 5 minutes of launching. When i was actually able to get into a match the fps was dropping constantly, switching between 1st and 3rd person felt extremely awkward, balancing felt terrible and im pretty sure i was playing mostly or entirely with bots.
Trash Game with Trash Players, Greedy Cash Grab Gooner Trash. Don't Bother

Great concept .... but its not executed right ...

I gave this a honest try .... but the 2 major things that I found with this game as well over the last 20+ years of gaming. 1. game seems to be " digitalized " Use to play " Combat arms " back in the day & when they sold it off to another publisher that " digitalized " the game .. they ruined it ... what I mean by that is games that are good have a analog-like " flow " to them vs like in this game it feels like its dropping frames while moving ... like its being hosted on a Celron processor or Intel apu.

And lastly .... on my system it couldnt do much over 90 fps in fact dipped under 60 fps at times at 1080p with 240hz refresh rate with a ryzen 9 5900x with 32 gigs of DDR4 4000, dual M.2 drives & a Radeon 6800.
It's all bots, even the reviews. One of the most janky games with the most wallet squeezing monetization. Ain't no amount of jiggle physics saving this.
Stiff gameplay, wonky controls, cawcaw animations, but The art style is kind of cool. Very unenjoyable and awkward. Diarheically bad.
It feels like a typical korean cashgrab. There's basically no gameplay, everything is for sell and the game is basically just bots.

Probably the worst shooter i have ever played. Crashed my pc within 5 minutes of launching. When i was actually able to get into a match the fps was dropping constantly, switching between 1st and 3rd person felt extremely awkward, balancing felt terrible and im pretty sure i was playing mostly or entirely with bots.

Bro you get kicked out a lobby so fucking fast it's retarded like You CANNOT load into a game and stand there before the match starts just waiting for the game to start you will get kicked....wtf..? AND SOO MANY NPCS IN SUPPOSABLE REAL PLAYER MATCHES
Trash Game with Trash Players, Greedy Cash Grab Gooner Trash. Don't Bother

I enjoy the gameplay and unique art style but i cannot recommend this game. After nearly 6 hours of gameplay, I have not matched with one single human. Every game mode is filled with bots. I was told once I move up in tiers there would be more player filled lobbies. I reached Lvl 14 and somehow still in Iron V. I am confused on how to move up in Tiers after winning every game (due to there only being bots). The customization is nice and I do not feel like I have to buy anything to enjoy the game. Some character melee animations are very janky, leaving you wondering if you are even attacking. I also like that the gameplay does not feel like it is strictly developed around abilities. Everyone feels useful. I have more pros than cons but the cons are too crucial to play. Overall it feels like a FPS aim training game due to never connecting with other players.
It is good but filled to the brim with bots.
It's only barely better than Marvel Rivals.

And lastly .... on my system it couldnt do much over 90 fps in fact dipped under 60 fps at times at 1080p with 240hz refresh rate with a ryzen 9 5900x with 32 gigs of DDR4 4000, dual M.2 drives & a Radeon 6800.
It's all bots, even the reviews. One of the most janky games with the most wallet squeezing monetization. Ain't no amount of jiggle physics saving this.
Stiff gameplay, wonky controls, cawcaw animations, but The art style is kind of cool. Very unenjoyable and awkward. Diarheically bad.
It feels like a typical korean cashgrab. There's basically no gameplay, everything is for sell and the game is basically just bots.

Probably the worst shooter i have ever played. Crashed my pc within 5 minutes of launching. When i was actually able to get into a match the fps was dropping constantly, switching between 1st and 3rd person felt extremely awkward, balancing felt terrible and im pretty sure i was playing mostly or entirely with bots.

Bro you get kicked out a lobby so fucking fast it's retarded like You CANNOT load into a game and stand there before the match starts just waiting for the game to start you will get kicked....wtf..? AND SOO MANY NPCS IN SUPPOSABLE REAL PLAYER MATCHES
Trash Game with Trash Players, Greedy Cash Grab Gooner Trash. Don't Bother

I enjoy the gameplay and unique art style but i cannot recommend this game. After nearly 6 hours of gameplay, I have not matched with one single human. Every game mode is filled with bots. I was told once I move up in tiers there would be more player filled lobbies. I reached Lvl 14 and somehow still in Iron V. I am confused on how to move up in Tiers after winning every game (due to there only being bots). The customization is nice and I do not feel like I have to buy anything to enjoy the game. Some character melee animations are very janky, leaving you wondering if you are even attacking. I also like that the gameplay does not feel like it is strictly developed around abilities. Everyone feels useful. I have more pros than cons but the cons are too crucial to play. Overall it feels like a FPS aim training game due to never connecting with other players.
It is good but filled to the brim with bots.
It's only barely better than Marvel Rivals.
